description: TechFlow Solutions is an Indian startup providing AI-powered workflow automation tools for businesses.

faq.question: What does your product do?
faq.answer: TechFlow Solutions provides AI-powered workflow automation tools that help businesses streamline their operations, reduce manual work, and increase productivity. Our platform integrates with popular business tools and automates repetitive tasks.

faq.question: Who is this product for?
faq.answer: Our product is designed for small to medium-sized businesses, startups, and teams looking to automate their workflows. It's particularly useful for companies that handle a lot of repetitive tasks and want to focus on growth.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier that includes basic automation features for up to 5 team members. It's perfect for trying out our platform and seeing how it can help your business.

faq.question: What are your pricing plans?
faq.answer: We have three main plans: Starter at ₹999/month for small teams, Professional at ₹2,999/month for growing businesses, and Enterprise with custom pricing for larger organizations. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

faq.question: How does the integration work?
faq.answer: Our platform integrates seamlessly with popular tools like Slack, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, and many others. Setup is simple - just connect your accounts and start creating automation workflows.

faq.question: Is there customer support?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We provide email support for all users, and Professional and Enterprise plans include priority support with faster response times. We also have comprehensive documentation and video tutorials.

faq.question: Can I try it before buying?
faq.answer: Yes, all our paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. You can also use our free tier indefinitely to explore the platform. No credit card required for the free tier.

faq.question: What kind of automations can I create?
faq.answer: You can automate a wide variety of tasks including email responses, data entry, report generation, task assignments, notifications, and much more. Our AI helps suggest automation opportunities based on your workflow patterns.
